abstract: Republican presidential candidates are pivoting rapidly as they seek to adapt to shifting national attitudes toward same-sex marriage; once a reliable wedge issue in primaries, subject has become a significant liability, especially among independent voters in general election; calculus is made more complex as Supreme Court prepares to hear arguments on issue.
lead_paragraph: Once a winning primary issue as well as a powerful wedge issue, same-sex marriage has grown far more complicated for Republicans.

headline.main: G.O.P. Struggling With Shifts on Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Struggling With Shifts on Gay Marriage

snippet: Once a winning primary issue as well as a powerful wedge issue, same-sex marriage has grown far more complicated for Republicans.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
